isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - OPERATION - ELECTRIC WINDSHIELD WIPERS (ROOF OR COWL MOUNTED) WITH HEADER MOUNTED SWITCHES

svcproc.title: ELECTRIC WINDSHIELD WIPERS (ROOF OR COWL MOUNTED) WITH HEADER MOUNTED SWITCHES
svcproc.para: Prior to July 1, 1993, electric wipers were roof mounted, and after July 1, 1993, the electric wipers are cowl mounted.
The electric wiper/washer control panel is located on the driver side of the cab in the header panel before June 1994.
Use the wiper speed control rocker switch to start and stop the wiper-only function, and to control wiper speed, HIGH or LOW.
Use the intermittent operation/washer control slide switch to control intermittent wiper operation, and to operate the windshield washer.
